raw: Local cycling studio co-owners get creative to keep business afloat .

raw: MARIETTA , Ga. ( CBS46 ) --

raw: Several small businesses are being forced to close their doors due to the coronavirus .
replaced: Several small businesses are being forced to close Several small businesses doors due to the coronavirus .

raw: But local cycling studio co - owners got a little creative to keep their business afloat – and give their customers an outlet while they 're stuck at home .

replaced: “ We said , you know what , our got 48 bikes sitting in our  the studio , collecting dust , and there are people out there who need it , ” Rickers said .

raw: Instead of coming into the studio , they ’re offering online classes -- knowing many people are stuck indoors due to the coronavirus .
replaced: Instead of coming into the studio , our offering online classes -- knowing many people are stuck indoors due to the coronavirus .

raw: They charge a small rental fee per month , which will help pay operating expenses the business needs to pay in the interim .
replaced: our charge a small rental fee per month , which will help pay operating expenses the business needs to pay in the interim .

raw: “ We ’ve had a lot of our riders say , you know what , we support you , we want to keep paying , even if they do n’t have a bike , and when we do reopen , we ’ll add rides to their account , ” Rickers added .
